Name: rolinherit
Description: Role automatically inherits privileges of roles it is\n a member of

Name: rolcatupdate
Description: Role may update system catalogs directly. (Even a\n superuser may not do this unless this column is true)

Name: rolcanlogin
Description: Role may log in. That is, this role can be given as\n the initial session authorization identifier

Name: rolconnlimit
Description: For roles that can log in, this sets maximum number\n of concurrent connections this role can make. -1 means no limit

Name: rolvaliduntil
Description: Password expiry time (only used for password\n authentication); NULL if no expiration

Name: rolconfig
Description: Session defaults for run-time configuration\n variables
